Well, as much as I hate to admit it, you're right about that. I can understand wanting a separate account so you don't have to comment on images as a mod, but I kind of wish he wouldn't- I talked to him a couple times as TSP, and he comes across as _very_ rude and condescending, much more so than he does as TFP.

Don't tell him I said that, though.
